A Step-By-Step Guide to Alberta Graduate Entrepreneur Stream

Foreign graduates who have studied at Alberta Universities can purchase a business and settle in Alberta through AAIP Graduate Entrepreneur Stream.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Entrepreneurs are essential contributors to Alberta’s economy because they use their skills and initiative to foresee needs and create jobs for Albertans. Entrepreneurs who take on the risks of a start-up business are rewarded with earnings and chances for continued expansion.

The Alberta Graduate Entrepreneur Stream is for foreign graduates who have studied at Alberta Universities and Colleges and wish to start or purchase a business in the province and obtain Canada PR by Investment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” Eligibility Requirements: AAIP Graduate Entrepreneur Stream

The Alberta Graduate Entrepreneur Stream eligibility requirements are as follows:[/vc_column_text][toggles style=”default”][toggle color=”Default” title=”Education”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650795301377{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]Applicants must have completed a program lasting two or more years at an Alberta College or University. They must have received their degree or diploma after completing this program.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Work Permit”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650795366360{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]Applicants must possess a valid Post-Graduation Work Permit (PGWP).[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Business Ownership Amount”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650795416803{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]

  • Applicants must maintain an ownership share of 34% or higher in the business they establish or purchase.
  • Their partners must also be Canadian citizens or Canadian permanent residents.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Language Proficiency”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650795397916{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]Applicants must demonstrate their language proficiency in English or French by scoring CLB level 7 or higher on a recognized language test.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_color=”#f7f7f7″ scene_position=”center” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” left_padding_desktop=”8%” right_padding_desktop=”8%” top_padding_phone=”15%” bottom_padding_phone=”15%” left_padding_phone=”7%” right_padding_phone=”7%” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Alberta Graduate Entrepreneur Stream Application Process

The application process for Alberta Graduate Entrepreneur Stream is as follows:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”3%” top_padding_phone=”5%” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”top” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_color=”#ebebeb” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Stage 1″ font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650452626636{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”5px”]

  • Research & Preparation
  • Registration
  • Application
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Stage 2″ font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650452476887{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”5px”]
  • Establishing and Operating the Business
  • Nomination
  • Permanent Residence
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” Stage One

[/nectar_highlighted_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”1. Research & Preparation” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650793904378{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Applicants must first assess whether they meet the minimum eligibility requirements mentioned above. They must also ensure their proposed business does not fall under the list of ineligible businesses.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”2. Registration” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650793884052{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Applicants can then apply for an Expression of Interest (EOI) online using the Alberta Advantage Immigration Program Portal. Note that this EOI is not an application for the Graduate Entrepreneur Stream. It simply indicates the applicant’s interest in applying for the program.

If the candidate meets the eligibility requirements described above, they will be placed in the EOI pool. The AAIP then selects candidates with the highest score and invites them to submit a Business Application.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”3. Application” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650793983892{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  • Candidates will then have ninety days to complete this application, pay a $3,500 CAD fee, and provide all supporting documents. They can complete this process online at the Alberta Advantage Immigration Program Portal.
  • The AAIP will then review the application before making a decision.
  • They may ask the applicant for additional information.
  • If the AAIP approves of the application, they will present the applicant with a Business Performance Agreement that details the terms and conditions they must meet after establishing or purchasing their business.
  • The candidate must sign this agreement and send a scanned copy within 14 days.
  • The AAIP will then provide them with a Business Application Approval Letter.
[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” highlight_color=”#ffc3b7″ style=”half_text”]

Stage Two

[/nectar_highlighted_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”4. Establishing and Operating the Business” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650795583929{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]
  • The entrepreneur must then move to Alberta and reside there while establishing or purchasing and operating the business.
  • They must operate their business according to the terms and conditions in the Business Performance Agreement for a minimum of one year.
  • If the entrepreneur’s work permit is going to expire during this period, they can contact AAIP and apply for a Letter of Support.
  • They can then use this letter to apply for a work permit extension through Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC).
[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”5. Nomination” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650794251874{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Once the candidate has operated their business for one year and has satisfied the terms and conditions in their Business Performance Agreement, they can apply for a permanent resident nomination via the AAIP by submitting a Final Report for Nomination.

If the AAIP approves of the Final Report, they will issue a nomination certificate. Applicants can then use this certificate to apply for permanent resident status with Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC).[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”6. Permanent Residency” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650794414715{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]If candidates are successful, IRCC will issue their new permanent resident status in Canada.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”How COLOSSUS can help you?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650794474861{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Prospective entrepreneurs and business people who wish to apply for the AAIP Graduate Entrepreneur Stream should get in touch with us. Our team of Regulated Immigration Consultants is familiar with each of these programs and can help optimize your application and improve your chances of receiving a provincial nomination. Start your entrepreneurial journey in Alberta with Colossus Migration.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_color=”#2d0fb1” scene_position=”center” constrain_group_1=”yes” top_padding_tablet=”2%” constrain_group_3=”yes” bottom_padding_tablet=”2%” top_padding_phone=”2%” constrain_group_5=”yes” bottom_padding_phone=”2%” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” class=”h2this” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”both” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=”tilt_alt”][vc_column column_padding=”padding-7-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”left-right” top_margin=”5%” bottom_margin=”5%” left_margin_phone=”3%” right_margin_phone=”3%” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” el_class=”testimonial” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Apply for Alberta Graduate Entrepreneur Stream

International Students can set up a business and get Canadian PR through AAIP Graduate Entrepreneur Stream.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default”
